Who am I?

Your Digital Partner

My name is Alejandro Diez and I'm a Web-Developer / Digital-Marketer. I build kick ass brands that tell awesome stories and have a passion for digital solutions. In this site you can see my background and previous work, current projects and future goals, hopefully we share some in common.

Now this is

What I do

Web Development

From Content Management System solutions to Full Stack Applications I'm fluent in various frameworks that provide flexible, fast and most importantly reliable platforms for your users.

CRM

Email Marketing platforms like MailChimp and Customer Relationship Managemenet software like Salesforce are the new standard in managing customer interaction.

Digital Marketing

At its core, every brand has something special to reveal something that inspires people this plan if you plan to create a small portfolio or busines showcase for you studio or business company.
